response.overview: Wrestlemania's greatest matches.  This video shows four of the World Wrestling Federation's greatest matches: • Hulk Hogan & Mr. T vs. Rowdy Roddy Piper & Paul Orndorff (Wrestlemania I)  • WWF Vs. NFL: 20 Man Battle Royal (Wrestlemania II) (see “Refrigerator” Perry pull Big John Stud out of the ring and Andre the Giant take on both members of the Hart Foundation)  • Hart Foundation & Danny Davis vs. The British Bulldogs & Tito Santana (Wrestlemania III)  • Intercontinental Championship: Brutus "The Barber" Beefcake vs. The Honky Tonk Man (Beefcake eventually cuts the hair of Jimmy Hart, who is Honky's manager)
response.title: WWF: Wrestlemania's Greatest Matches
